Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Mace and Shield -- 10% chance to break your joints -- Increases movement by 3 -- Increase health by 60 -- Has the spinning swirl attack -- Shield can block projectiles
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter
local damage = 16
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local chanceToBreak = 10
function blow(hit) -- For the Sword humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sword or rightGrip.Part1 == Sword) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) tick() if math.random(1, 100) <= chanceToBreak then if hit then hit:BreakJoints() end end end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function onActivated() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then return end end
function onEquipped() print("On Equip") vCharacter = Tool.Parent torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") script.Parent.RezScript.RezIn.Value= not script.Parent.RezScript.RezIn.Value end
function onUnequipped() torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local Handle=script.Parent.Handle local trailPart=Instance.new('Part') trailPart.BrickColor=BrickColor.new('Cyan') trailPart.CanCollide=false trailPart.Anchored=true trailPart.CFrame=CFrame.new(Vector3.new(99999999,999999999,99999999)) trailPart.FormFactor='Custom' trailPart.Parent=script.Parent trailPart.Size= Vector3.new(1,1,1) trailPart.Transparency=.7 trailPart.TopSurface=0 trailPart.BottomSurface=0 local trailLength=20 local currentHead=1 local newHeadLength=2 --how long to stretch before a new head is spawned local initHeadCenter
local trailPartPool = {}
function onTouch(self,hit) if self.Transparency==1 or not hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') or hit.Parent == script.Parent.Parent then return end hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid'):TakeDamage(1) end
function lerpTransparency(part, itrans, ftrans, length) local initTime=time() while time()-initTime<length do part.Transparency=itrans+((ftrans-itrans)*((time()-initTime)/length)) wait() end part.Transparency=ftrans end
for i=1,trailLength,1 do trailPartPool[i]=trailPart:Clone() trailPartPool[i].Parent=script.Parent trailPartPool[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) onTouch(trailPartPool[i],hit) end) wait() end
local lastNewHeadTime= time()
trailPartPool[1].CFrame=CFrame.new(Handle.CFrame.p,Handle.CFrame.p) initHeadCenter=Handle.CFrame.p
while true do --for i=1,trailLength,1 do
--end local headPos=trailPartPool[currentHead].CFrame local nlength=(Handle.CFrame.p-initHeadCenter).magnitude trailPartPool[currentHead].Size=Vector3.new(1,2,nlength) trailPartPool[currentHead].CFrame=CFrame.new((initHeadCenter+Handle.CFrame.p)/2,Handle.CFrame.p)
if nlength>newHeadLength then currentHead=((currentHead+1)%trailLength)+1 trailPartPool[currentHead].CFrame=CFrame.new(Handle.CFrame.p,Handle.CFrame.p) initHeadCenter=Handle.CFrame.p Spawn(function() lerpTransparency(trailPartPool[currentHead], .1, 1, 2) end) end
wait() end

-- Sword and shield
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local vCharacter local shieldWeld
local shieldWalkAnim local slashAnim local bashAnim local lungeAnim local spinAnim local time
local lastAttack = 0
local bashDamage = 12 local connection
local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0
local torsoCFrames = {}
local bg
local runService = game:service("RunService")
function slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso)
spinAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SpinAnim) if spinAnim then spinAnim:Play() end
bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, bg.P, bg.P) bg.Name = "BG"
torsoCFrames[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoCFrames[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bg.Parent = myTorso
for i = 1, 84 do local c = i%6 + 1 if bg then bg.cframe = torsoCFrames[c] end wait(0.025) end
if bg then bg:Remove() end wait(2.0) end
function onKeyDown(key) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end if key == "w" then t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function bash(hit) if hit.Anchored == false then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local opponent = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~=nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm then
end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag:Remove() end end end
function onActivatedLocal() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
--slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.QuickSlash) bashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ShieldBash)
t = runService.Stepped:wait() if t - dashTime < 0.2 then slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) wait(0.5) amAnimating = false else Sword.HitSound:Play() if bashAnim then bashAnim:Play() end wait(0.6) amAnimating = false end wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if bashAnim then bashAnim:Stop() end if spinAnim then spinAnim:Stop() end if bg then bg:Remove() end
if vCharacter then myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end if connection then connection:disconnect() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedLocal)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Handle= script.Parent.Handle local Resolution=50 local selectPart=Instance.new('SelectionBox') selectPart.Visible=true selectPart.Color=BrickColor.new('Medium blue')
function updatePosition(part,follow,offset,timelength) local initTime=time() while time()-initTime<timelength and part do part.CFrame=CFrame.new(follow.CFrame*offset)--,follow.CFrame.lookVector+follow.CFrame.p) wait() end end
function lerpTransparency(part, itrans, ftrans, length) local initTime=time() while time()-initTime<length do part.Transparency=itrans+((ftrans-itrans)*((time()-initTime)/length)) wait() end part.Transparency=ftrans end
local inrez= false
function rezIn() if inrez then return end inrez=true Handle.EquipSound:Play() Handle.Transparency=1 local rezParts={} local selectBoxes = {} local Hsize=Handle.Size wait() for i=1,Resolution, 1 do rezParts[i]=Instance.new('Part') rezParts[i].Anchored=true rezParts[i].Parent=game.Lighting rezParts[i].Size=Vector3.new(Hsize.x/2,(Hsize.y*2)/Resolution,Hsize.z/2) --Spawn(function() updatePosition(rezParts[i],Handle,Vector3.new(0,0,Resolution)*i, 5) end) Spawn(function() updatePosition(rezParts[i],Handle,Vector3.new(0,(((Hsize.y*2)/Resolution)*i)-4.5,0), 10) end) selectBoxes[i]=selectPart:Clone() selectBoxes[i].Color=BrickColor.new('Bright blue') selectBoxes[i].Parent=script.Parent selectBoxes[i].Transparency=0 selectBoxes[i].Adornee=rezParts[i] wait(.03) Spawn(function() lerpTransparency(selectBoxes[i],1,.1, 4); lerpTransparency(selectBoxes[i],.1, 1, .5) end) selectBoxes[i].Color=BrickColor.new('Medium blue') end
wait(3) Handle.Transparency=0 wait(2) for i=1,Resolution, 1 do rezParts[i]:Destroy() selectBoxes[i]:Destroy() end print('finished rez in') --while true do wait() end inrez=false end while not script:FindFirstChild('RezIn') do wait() end script.RezIn.Changed:connect(rezIn)
function rezOut()
end
